snippet.title: The Spirit and the Mouse Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: In this new trailer for The Spirit and the Mouse, we see Lila the mouse using her electrifying powers to track down adorable Kibblins and illuminate Sainte-et-Claire once more. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1679210/The_Spirit_and_the_Mouse/ #indiegames #switch #nintendoswitch
